text: I'm a diehard metalhead for over 40 years and I like the heaviest shit possible. Having said that, I just turned 50 and the older I get, the more I like contrast. I've always been a big Prince fan also, and alot of this reminds me of him. Been gravitating more to it lately. The point is, great music knows no classification or label. Universal.
